暗.definition: dark; to turn dark; secret; hidden; (literary) confused; ignorant

暗中.definition: in the dark; in secret; on the sly; surreptitiously

暗中監視.definition: to monitor secretly; to spy on

暗冕鷦鶯.definition: (bird species of China) rufescent prinia (Prinia rufescens)

暗合.definition: to agree implicitly; of one mind; views coincide without a word exchanged

暗含.definition: to imply; to suggest; to connote; implicit

暗哨兒.definition: whistle given as a secret signal

暗喜.definition: hidden smile; smirk; to rejoice covertly; secret satisfaction concerning one's evil plans

暗害.definition: to kill secretly; to stab in the back

暗察明訪.definition: open enquiries and secret search (idiom); to investigate openly and in secret; taking information from all sides

暗戀.definition: to be secretly in love with

暗扣.definition: hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)

暗指.definition: to hint at; to imply; sth hidden

暗樁.definition: submerged piles installed to prevent the passage of boats; (fig.) informer; spy

暗淡.definition: dark; dim (light); dull (color); drab; (fig.) gloomy; bleak

暗渠.definition: underground water channel; covered ditch; culvert

暗渡陳倉.definition: lit. secretly crossing the Wei River 渭河[Wei4 He2] at Chencang (idiom, refers to a stratagem used by Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] in 206 BC against Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3] of Chu); fig. to feign one thing while doing another; to cheat under cover of a diversion

暗灰鵑鵙.definition: (bird species of China) black-winged cuckooshrike (Lalage melaschistos)

暗無天日.definition: all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice

暗疾.definition: unmentionable disease; a disease one is ashamed of

暗示.definition: to hint; to suggest; hint; suggestion

暗笑.definition: laugh in (up) one's sleeve; snigger; snicker

暗箭.definition: attack by a hidden enemy; a stab in the back

暗箱操作.definition: covert activities (election rigging etc); under-the-table manipulations; black operations

暗綠柳鶯.definition: (bird species of China) greenish warbler (Phylloscopus trochiloides)

暗綠繡眼鳥.definition: (bird species of China) Swinhoe's white-eye (Zosterops simplex)

暗綠背鸕鶿.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese cormorant (Phalacrocorax capillatus)

暗罵.definition: to curse under one's breath; to grumble inaudibly

暗背雨燕.definition: (bird species of China) dark-rumped swift (Apus acuticauda)

暗胸朱雀.definition: (bird species of China) dark-breasted rosefinch (Procarduelis nipalensis)

暗腹雪雞.definition: (bird species of China) Himalayan snowcock (Tetraogallus himalayensis)

暗色鴉雀.definition: (bird species of China) grey-hooded parrotbill (Suthora zappeyi)

暗花兒.definition: veiled design incised in porcelain or woven in fabric

暗記.definition: to commit to memory; secret mark

暗訪.definition: to make secret inquiries; to investigate in secret

暗轉.definition: (theater) blackout (e.g. at the end of a scene); (literary) to be promoted in rank secretly

暗送秋波.definition: to cast flirtatious glances at sb (idiom)
